content.text:
# Draft:2025 United Kingdom accidental prisoner release

In the United Kingdom between 1 April and 31 October 2025, 91 prisoners were accidentally released from custody.
This includes several high-profile cases, Ethiopian sex offender Hadush Kebatu released from HM Prison Chelmsford, Algerian sex offender Brahim Kaddour-Cherif from HM Prison Wandsworth and fraudster William "Billy" Smith from Wandsworth.
